attributes.action: make people who come to live in our country pay health insurance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i put forward to the goverment that if you insist on bleeding our country dry then people who want to live in our country should look after their health and pay for it. if famillies are coming over for a free ride this action may put them off. we need to look after who we have already in this country. pluss more of the lottery money should go to the nhs
